      • futureValue

        public static double futureValue(double _present_val,
                 double _rate,
                 int _num_periods)
        Simple future value calculator. Used to apply interest to the account.
        Parameters:
        _present_val - present value of the account ( i.e. balance )
        _rate - the interest rate
        _num_periods - number of periods to calculate
        Returns:
        the future value based on compound interest
